Name: Lost Memories
About the game: Overview of the game: Getting lost and completing puzzles to continue on the path. With roguelike elements mixed in with horror and storytelling. If you are into speed running through games there is a mode for you! Lost Memories has a lot to offer for all players to enjoy. Gameplay features: An action horror game where are you running hide and solve puzzles. Fear system: if you arenâ€™t in a building or around a campfire, you will start the game fear which will make your vision, cloudy, and your movement slower. Weapons: there is one single weapon that can disable the enemies movement if you can find it. Flashlight: the flashlight is used for finding your way through Lost memories. Why I made this game: I made this game for the players to experience a simple roguelike horror game with passionate storytelling. What this game expresses: I want Lost Memories to have the players feel like no matter the memory no matter how long it has been since the memory. It will never be lost. I hope everyone enjoys my game and can find peace when they play and challenge themselves. Content: Being early but ready for the public. I wanted the game to be released so they can experience the single-player mode. I have a multiplayer mode in mind that will be released at a later time.
